00020 struct Compress* cprInit( struct Compress* cpr, FILE* file )
00021 {
00022         cpr->source = file;
00023         cpr->out = malloc( CHUNK );
00024 
00025         /* allocate deflate state */
00026         cpr->strm.zalloc = Z_NULL;
00027         cpr->strm.zfree = Z_NULL;
00028         cpr->strm.opaque = Z_NULL;
00029         int ret = deflateInit2( &cpr->strm, Z_DEFAULT_COMPRESSION, Z_DEFLATED, 15, 5, Z_DEFAULT_STRATEGY );
00030         if ( ret != Z_OK ) {
00031                 return 0;
00032         }
00033 
00034         cpr->done = 0;
00035         return cpr;
00036 }

00117 void cprDel( struct Compress* cpr )
00118 {
00119         deflateEnd( &cpr->strm );
00120         free( cpr->out );
00121         
00122 //      gzclose( cpr->file );
00123 }

00126 void zerr( int ret )
00127 {
00128         fputs( "zpipe: ", stderr );
00129         switch ( ret ) {
00130         case Z_ERRNO:
00131                 if ( ferror( stdin ) )
00132                         fputs( "error reading stdin\n", stderr );
00133                 if ( ferror( stdout ) )
00134                         fputs( "error writing stdout\n", stderr );
00135                 break;
00136         case Z_STREAM_ERROR:
00137                 fputs( "invalid compression level\n", stderr );
00138                 break;
00139         case Z_DATA_ERROR:
00140                 fputs( "invalid or incomplete deflate data\n", stderr );
00141                 break;
00142         case Z_MEM_ERROR:
00143                 fputs( "out of memory\n", stderr );
00144                 break;
00145         case Z_VERSION_ERROR:
00146                 fputs( "zlib version mismatch!\n", stderr );
00147         }
00148 }
